Trigger.Name: Celestial Opposition (Nocturnal)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of Nocturnal Opposition

Trigger.Name: Celestial Opposition (Diurnal)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of Diurnal Opposition

Trigger.Name: Stright Shot
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of .*Straight Shot Ready

Trigger.Name: The Rose of Destruction
Trigger.RegularExpression: You cast The Rose of Destruction

Trigger.Name: Removes used waymarks after Sacrament/Radiant Sacrament is done

Action.TriggerText: showText('Protean Spread > Double Charge > Tanks Tether',2,30)
showText('Protean Groups > Bait Charge > Party South',2,30)

Trigger.Name: Prismatic Solver 1.6 (README in Description tab of this trigger)
Trigger.Description:
This trigger calls out Prismatic Deception safe spots when the casts of Blasting Zone start on the enemy list. The calls by default are North, Northeast, East, Southeast, obviously the cardinal/intercardinal direction opposite of what the trigger calls will be safe too. If you prefer, you can change the things the TTS actions call in the Trigger Actions tab of the this trigger.
Version History: v1.4: Public Release v1.5: Rewrote part of this trigger to have fewer moving parts since it wasn't executing consistently v1.6: I swear to god this thing works now

Trigger.Name: Local Regression (loses)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1E:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<first>[a-zA-Z']*) (?<last>[a-zA-Z']*) loses the effect of Local Regression

Trigger.Name: Local Regression (gains)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<first>[a-zA-Z']*) (?<last>[a-zA-Z']*) gains the effect of Local Regression

Trigger.Name: You gain the effect of Meat Shield
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of Meat Shield

Trigger.Name: Equipment Broken
Trigger.RegularExpression: The condition of your .* is now 0%

Trigger.Name: Food Wore
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1E:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<char>.*) loses the effect of Well Fed

Trigger.Name: Inactive Warning
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<minutes>[0-9]) minutes have elapsed since your last activity\. If you are inactive for 10 minutes, you will be expelled from the duty\.
